description: Returns a list of model customization jobs that you have submitted. You can filter the jobs to return based on one or more criteria. For more information, see Custom models in the Amazon Bedrock User Guide.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the total number of results is greater than the maxResults value provided in the request, use this token when making another request in the nextToken field to return the next batch of results.

nested_items.name: modelCustomizationJobSummaries
nested_items.description: Job summaries.

nested_items.name: jobArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the customization job.

nested_items.name: baseModelArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the base model.

nested_items.name: jobName
nested_items.description: Name of the customization job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: Status of the customization job.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: Time that the customization job was last modified.

nested_items.name: statusDetails
nested_items.description: Details about the status of the data processing sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: validationDetails
nested_items.description: The status details for the validation sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the validation sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the validation sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The latest update to the validation sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: dataProcessingDetails
nested_items.description: The status details for the data processing sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the data processing sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the data processing sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The latest update to the data processing sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: trainingDetails
nested_items.description: The status details for the training sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the training sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the training sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: lastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The latest update to the training sub-task of the job.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: Creation time of the custom model.

nested_items.name: endTime
nested_items.description: Time that the customization job ended.

nested_items.name: customModelArn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the custom model.

nested_items.name: customModelName
nested_items.description: Name of the custom model.

nested_items.name: customizationType
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to carry out continued pre-training of a model or whether to fine-tune it. For more information, see Custom models.
